name: Anal Fissure
chief_complaint: Sharp pain during bowel movements and bright red blood on toilet paper
symptoms: Bright red blood on stool or toilet paper
Itching or irritation around the anus
physical_findings: Visible tear in the anal mucosa
prognosis: Excellent with proper treatment, usually heals within 4-6 weeks
description: A small tear in the thin, moist tissue (mucosa) that lines the anus. Most commonly caused by passing large or hard stools.
